example.title: ButtonSettings
example.description:
To turn on/turn off functional buttons, you do

$listbox->ButtonSettings->ShowDelete = true;
$listbox->ButtonSettings->ShowReorder = true;
$listbox->ButtonSettings->ShowTransfer = true;
$listbox->ButtonSettings->ShowTransferAll = true;

To change position of button set, you set:

$listbox->ButtonSettings->Position = "Left";

To set alignment, you set

$listbox->ButtonSettings->HorizonalAlign = "Left";
$listbox->ButtonSettings->VerticalAlign = "Bottom";
